import React from 'react'; import { useState } from 'react'; const FormDetails = () => { const [myName, setMyName] = useState(null); const [favLanguage, setFavLanguage] = useState(null); const [favCar, setFavCar] = useState(null); return (
{ e.preventDefault(); console.log(myName) console.log(favLanguage); console.log(favCar); }} > setMyName(e.target.value)} />
Choose your favourite language
setFavLanguage(e.target.value)} />
setFavLanguage(e.target.value)} />
setFavLanguage(e.target.value)} />
Checkbox
setFavCar(e.target.value)} />
setFavCar(e.target.value)} />
setFavCar(e.target.value)} />
); } export default FormDetails;
